text: Ebonyi is one of the 36 states of Nigeria. The capital is Abakaliki. There are 13 Local Governments in Ebonyi State, namely: Abakaliki, Izzi, Ezza North, Afikpo South, Ohaukwu, Ebonyi, Oniocha, Ishielu, Ezza South, Ikwo, Afikpo North, Ohaozara, Ivo == References == Category:States of Nigeria
title: Ebonyi State
